text: Thaddeus Victor Jude (born December 13, 1951) is an American politician in the state of Minnesota. He served in the Minnesota House of Representatives and Minnesota Senate. Jude was born in St. Cloud, Minnesota. He served in the United States Army Reserves. Jude went to the University of St. Thomas and William Mitchell College of Law.Minnesota Legislators Past & Present Thaddeus V. Jude Jude was the youngest person elected to the Minnesota Legislature, elected at the age of 20 when he won election in 1972 and was sworn in at the age of 21 the following January. His father, Victor N. Jude also served in the Minnesota Legislature. He serves as a judge on Minnesota's 10th Judicial District Court.https://www.twincities.com/2010/11/02/washington-county-judges- race-tad-jude-leading-early-returns/ ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from St. Cloud, Minnesota Category:Military personnel from Minnesota Category:University of St. Thomas (Minnesota) alumni Category:William Mitchell College of Law alumni Category:Minnesota Democrats Category:Minnesota lawyers Category:Minnesota state court judges Category:Minnesota state senators Category:Members of the Minnesota House of Representatives
title: Tad Jude
